sentences.sentence: If you are still using firmware 1.x on your iPhone, CopyTrans Manager will work out of the box to sync your iPhone.
sentences.translation: 如果你的 iPhone 仍是 firmware 1.x 版本，CopyTrans Manager 将能解决你的 iPhone 的同步问题。

sentences.sentence: That piece of code is the boot firmware.
sentences.translation: 这段代码就是引导固件。
